about_the_game:
RedEyes: Honor of the Red Eyes DLC SV Battle Monster Material. You need to have the RedEyes game to download

Install yanfly's plug-in YEP_X_AnimatedSVEnemies can be used as an enemy

Can also be used as a character SV diagram

The Honour of Red Eyes series material: initial SV battle monster material, dynamic monster battle picture material with matching walking pictures, etc.

Then if you know how to use the YEP_X_ActSeqPack series of plug-ins, you can create rich, vivid and gorgeous combat skills.

This material contains multiple types of monsters and more than two colors

The dynamic monster picture in this material contains more than 3 attack actions and other actions

Give away some iconsets and some animation effects

This material will be updated continuously. Thank you for your support!

The copyright of this DLC belongs to the author. The material can be used in various RPG games or games made by game engines. The material can be commercially available and can be modified but secondary sales are prohibited. Please indicate in your game that the material comes from the author (不死鱼.安兹.乌尔.饭) Material Thank you

RedEyes: Honor of the Red Eyes DLC SV Battle Monster Material. You need to have the RedEyes game to download

Can also be used as a character SV diagram

The Honour of Red Eyes series material: initial SV battle monster material, dynamic monster battle picture material with matching walking pictures, etc.

Then if you know how to use the YEP_X_ActSeqPack series of plug-ins, you can create rich, vivid and gorgeous combat skills.

The dynamic monster picture in this material contains more than 3 attack actions and other actions

name: RedEyes Animation Monster Fourth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10/11 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 1GB memory recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10/11 (64bit)
  • Processor: 4 GHz dual core or 8 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory, 4GB memory recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 16 MB available space

short_description: RedEyes: Honor of the Red Eyes DLC SV Battle Monster Material. You need to have the RedEyes game to download The dynamic monster battle map material comes with a matching walking map, which can produce rich, vivid and gorgeous battle skills. What are you waiting for!
